entries.text: Thank you for calling VeloFit Customer Service. How can I assist you today?
Hi, I'd like to return some items I recently purchased.
Okay, I can help with that. Could you please provide your order number or the email address associated with your account?
Thank you. I see your order here. What items are you looking to return?
I want to return the cycling shoes and the road tires I bought.
Okay, I understand. Before we proceed, have the shoes been used at all? Were they perhaps, mounted to your pedals and have cleat marks on the soles?
Yeah, I did try them out on a ride. So, yeah, there are cleat marks. And about the tires, I did get them installed, too.
I see. And the tires were installed and ridden on?
Yep, just a short ride. So, they have dirty tires now.

Thank you for the information. Unfortunately, because the shoes have been used and have cleat marks, and the tires were mounted and used, we cannot accept them for a return. Items need to be in new, unused condition. Once items have been installed and ridden on, creating dirty tires and used cleat marks, we cannot resell them as new. This is part of our return policy.
Oh, I see. That makes sense, I guess.
We apologize for any inconvenience this may cause. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?
No, I think that's all. Thanks for explaining.
You're very welcome. We appreciate your understanding and value you as a VeloFit customer. Have a great day!
